explanation: Funds are realigned within the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force, 24/25, appropriation to Program Element (PE) 0603680F (Manufacturing Technology Program) from PE 0604183F (Hypersonics Prototyping - Hypersonics Attack Cruise Missile) for proper execution of a FY 2024 congressional increase to accelerate air-breathing hypersonic manufacturing all up round (AUR) maturation. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated. This is a congressional special interest item.
